HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: PPL: 99 Kč, Zásilkovna: 99 Kč, Balíkovna na adresu: 89 Kč. Doprava zdarma nad 1 499 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL ParcelShop: 79 Kč, Zásilkovna výdejní místo: 69 Kč, Balíkovna: 59 Kč. Doprava zdarma nad 1 499 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: PPL ParcelBox/AlzaBox: 79 Kč, Zásilkovna Z-BOX: 69 Kč, Balíkovna BOX: 59 Kč. Doprava zdarma nad 1 499 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Rockpoint.cz offers Home Delivery, Parcel Shops, Parcel Lockers, and In-Store Pickup within the Czech Republic. PROVIDERS: Main carriers are PPL, Zásilkovna, and Balíkovna (Česká pošta). PRICING: Prices range from 59 Kč for Balíkovna pickup points to 99 Kč for home delivery. Free shipping is available for orders over 1,499 Kč. In-store pickup is always free. DELIVERY TIME: The general delivery timeframe is 3-7 business days. NOTABLE FEATURES: A flat COD surcharge of 39 Kč applies to all eligible services. Parcel locker and some pickup point deliveries require prepayment of COD via app or online. In-store pickup is available at a wide network of Rock Point, Hannah, and KEEN stores but requires prepayment. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented very clearly on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page. All options, providers, and prices are well-structured and easy to compare, making for a high-quality user experience.
